website_summaries.verdict: Charming and creative baking set inspires your child's imagination.
pros: Sea-themed set includes whisk, spoon, and measuring cups
Turtle lid doubles as a strainer
Appeals to a wide range of kids from toddlers to preteens
High marks for sturdy and durable material
cons: Be careful, as the lid may come loose

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and fun but lid doesn't stay on
customer_reviews.text: This set is super cute, my 3 year old loves it. It's great for mixing dirt, mud, sand, rocks, leave, there's not much I haven't seen "cooked" in this bowl. I would buy this again for sure! One thing to mention though, is that the turtle lid doesn't stay on, in fact it got tossed in the trash almost right away. Not a big deal for us but might bother others.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest beach toy I ever purchased. Going to purchase another one because my toy girls had a hard time sharing this cute toy. I was so surprised how big the bowl was. You can hold a lot of water in it from the beach. We made great sand castles from the the measuring cups & the bowl. This makes a summer great for kids or adults😂 because I liked it for myself. Toys are not made cheap. Great material.
customer_reviews.author: CodRos2

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The Sand Box has become a new Gastropub. Every Mellissa & Doug toy I've purchased, or had handed down, has been of Very High Quality. Glad to know that we will get many years of use of them. Lots of fun for kids and adults too.
customer_reviews.author: Odman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Beach Toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 1/2 year old daughter loves this set! She pretends she is making all kinds of baked treats (mostly cakes) at the beach with this. It is adorable! Even her older cousins/friends play with it. The scoops, whisk, and spoon are just perfect for them to pretend they are measuring and mixing things. And the "bowl" ends up being an extra bucket too. Love this! I accidentally bought two of these and my 11 year old niece and 7 year old nephew play with my daughter's set so much I'm just going to give them the other set. :-)
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not a good deal.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice kit but I ended up returning it because I found a much cheaper version that had even more toys included (such as a teeny watering can, plastic fish, and a little net). The turtle at the top also looks weird and my daughter never played with him. So he always ended up tossed in the corner on his back, belly exposed to the hot sun while my little princess splashed around in her cool wading pool. I felt sorry for the little guy (and wanted my money back) so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: That Math Chick

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Set for Sand Lovers
customer_reviews.text: We loved this product, as we love most things from this brand!!! :) My daughter loved the pretend baking scenarios she was able to play on the beach. The only thing this item needs is some type of handle or latch that keeps the lid on and prevents the other inside toys from falling out while transporting. I deducted one star because my toddler couldn't carry it herself reliably (lid kept falling off, toys falling out) and it takes up too much space in the beach bag to carry it that way.
customer_reviews.author: Wife_Mama_Teacher

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much cuter in person. My son likes to use baking scoops in the sand so I ordered this set, but we ended up using it in the kitchen instead. He loves to help me bake, and has really enjoyed having his own mixing bowl, spoons, etc. The plastic is high quality, and the colours are vibrant. As always, Melissa and Doug deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach or for backyard water play
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the beach or for backyard water play. The bucket is a good size and all accessories are really cute. My daughters, 3 and 10 months, both play with this.
customer_reviews.author: ycm

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality, don’t use with wet sand
customer_reviews.text: My son filled the bucket with wet sand and it was so heavy it broke. It is not as sturdy as a regular sand pail and I was disappointed in the quality for a Melissa and Doug product. All of the pieces are cute and kids of all ages 3-9 had fun playing pretend with them but I was upset when something broke after only a couple uses and with something so common as wet sand, I’m not surprised to see others had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Brackbill

customer_reviews.title: Sand Fun
customer_reviews.text: Well made and typical Melissa and Doug quality. Worth the extra money over the traditional cheap sand toys. My daughter and her friends loved these. Will buy the other pieces like this in the future for use.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable pretend sand and water baking set
customer_reviews.text: My two-year-old loves "cooking" with water and sand and this is absolutely perfect! With this your little one can make "soup" and "cake" for everyone at the playground. I do think that maybe it's a bit overpriced for a bowl 3 cups a spoon a whisk and the turtle sieve top but when you're a little kid love something you're willing to pay it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this set!
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo has always loved this set when others have shared their toys with him in the past couple years. I finally saw it for a good price, and bought him his own set this year (as we are mostly stuck at home social distancing). Both he and our 1yo ADORE this set for water play outside. It's cute, and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: NJB

customer_reviews.title: Great for inspiring bakers and others :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew’s first beach trip. It is just as pictured. He started ‘cooking’ as soon as he opened it at home and kept enjoying it in the pool area and at the beach. His imaginative play with it was great. We fake ate cupcakes, cookies, soup, etc. all week. The only part that I thought could be better is the lid can be challenging to get back on, but we only put it on when we were traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ross

customer_reviews.title: Don’t need the holes!
customer_reviews.text: This cute but would rethink the holes in the end of the scoops. My 3 year old grandson got his finger stuck in one and had to have a doctor remove it! Had to cut the handle off to be able to work easier trying to remove it. He was finally successful but the poor child was terrified.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This is very sturdy and absolutely perfect for any kids that loves to ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter absolutely loves using this set to prepare her cookie dough and pizza dough to use with her other Melissa & Dough sand toy sets. This is very sturdy and absolutely perfect for any kids that loves to bake or cook. These sets have kept my daughter busy for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mom to a zoo of 4

customer_reviews.title: Lid does not snap onto bucket
customer_reviews.text: The lid does not snap onto the bucket for easy storage, just sits on top.
customer_reviews.author: Moxie

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I love the set however I wish the top would stay attached for easier travel. Maybe if the bucket had a strap handle to carry would even help. Cute set but requires a bag to carry the many pieces and could be more convenient with little ones
customer_reviews.author: Sav

customer_reviews.title: enjoyable with very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for my two year old grand son. He places the bowl on his head and uses the bowl to place toys in. I can easily make the bowl spin around in the pool and the spin lasts long. Then we toss toys into it while it is floating. He giggles
customer_reviews.author: Alice Weisbrod

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Thought this item would be good for a sandbox and for use at the shore. Bought for my 2 1/2 year old grandson who happens to love anything do to with cooking. He will get a lot of pleasure using this. Nice that all pieces fit inside pail.
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little set! We live at the beach and needed a small but entertaining toy to take with us. We use it daily and it’s definitely a favorite. I just wish the bucket had a handle and the top screwed on. Otherwise we love it!
customer_reviews.author: kate washburn

customer_reviews.title: Loved this!! Such a hit with a wide range of ages!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was a hit at our last camping trip. All the cousins wanted to play with these. Ages 3-15. They all loved it. They had fun with the sifter top, all the measuring cups, and the huge container. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Girl

customer_reviews.title: A quality set of toys—a big hit with my “Littles!”
customer_reviews.text: My three and five year-old granddaughters loved this set. Unlike most sand toys, these are smooth and sturdy. Their price reflects this point; but I’d rather not replace the normal thin, faded sand toys I’d see after a summer’s use.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth652

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute and I love the bigger size...its very sturdy. The ONLY thing that they could have done is make the lid seal on so it would stay...it basically just sits on the top and falls off easily.
customer_reviews.author: WifeyMommaGrammy

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I loved this set when it arrived, but the bowl broke into large sharp shards within a few months. It was stored in a covered, weather proof sandbox that is on a covered porch, and it wasn't put through any extreme abuse or anything... it just wasn't the quality I'm used to from Melissa and Doug products.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend highly!
customer_reviews.text: I was Looking for pool toys for my 2year old son When i found this. He LOVES it (every other kid at the pool wants to play with it ,and luckily it comes with a couple different things it's sharable) . it wouldbe really cool as a beach toy. all the pieces seem really durable. Every piece has a purpose and it all stores right in the pot.
customer_reviews.author: R Fulghum

customer_reviews.title: Fun outdoor toy
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute and fit together perfectly. We have a gravel box that my toddler and preschooler play in. They love them. They can share the scoops and make “recipes” with the gravel. Would be really fun with sand and mud too. Would even work with a water table.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Bartley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my little guy who is OBSESSED Witt water
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my little guy who is OBSESSED Witt water. Everything is easily stored in the main bucket with the turtle lid that goes on top. So it’s easy for us to transport back and forth to the pool without worrying about losing pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great beach toys
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my girls ( 6 and 3) to play with at the beach. They played happily with this for hours and it has been just as fun at home with water. It seems like it will last a long time even with regular play. Enough pieces that children can share and still have a great time.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M.

customer_reviews.title: Everything seems well made
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Everything seems well made, I only wish that the turtle top actually snapped on to the bowl rather than just sitting on top, but my son likes playing with it regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Heather K

customer_reviews.title: ... and his cousins (7 yr old twin girls) absolutely love to play with this at the beach
customer_reviews.text: My son (4 yrs old) and his cousins (7 yr old twin girls) absolutely love to play with this at the beach. They make all kinds of crazy concoctions- gathering ingredients from the beach (salt - pebbles, oil/milk - water, flour - sand). It's been fun to watch their creativity! Very pleased with set.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Horan

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: We love all the Melissa & Doug stuff but this is just a frustration. The top doesn’t fit on securely and it drives both our two year old and us crazy. There is no way to clamp it down, which makes transporting or carrying a mess. Also it should have a handle on it for the same reason. It’s such a simple thing that ruins this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this when it was on sale and it is colorful, well made, and adorable! My two and four year old have been using it a lot outside and so far it's been holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: High quality sand toys
customer_reviews.text: Super cute sand toy set that my 5 year old daughter loves and keeps her entertained in and out of the sand. The bucket and scoops are extremely high quality and I expect them to last a long time. The pieces are fun to play with to make creations but can also be used for a wide variety of play.
customer_reviews.author: rr

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! It's made to last and I love the little details of it. Holding up so well to children's sandbox and water table.
customer_reviews.author: Q Wan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: We keep this in our RV for the kids when we stay at the beach. They work great and the kids love it so its a win for me. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S

customer_reviews.title: Turtle bucket he loves in his Tub.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his bucket and spoons. He does not use it for his sandbox though. He actually uses it during bath time and play time in the house. Lol Great product. It keeps him busy with his other toys.
customer_reviews.author: awesome girl

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids loved it. Another quality product from Melissa & Doug.
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Melissa & Doug products. The prices are realistic and the quality is good. Recommend this for sandbox or beach. Grandkids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Uglider

customer_reviews.title: My boys LOVE this set
customer_reviews.text: My boys LOVE this set. They used it at the beach and now at home in our water table or sand box. It's a very sturdy set that gives many hours of imaginative play.
customer_reviews.author: beachin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tiny chefs
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice spin on the normal bucket and pail beach kit. My kids play with this inside, at the beach, and in the backyard. They love pretending to make sand and dirt cakes. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: hours of sandy fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (and my niece and nephew) LOVED playing with this and "baking" at the beach last summer. Perfect sand toy.
customer_reviews.author: richa521

customer_reviews.title: Great For Toddlers Imaginations
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for toddlers who love to cook but also love playing in the dirt. My son has played with daily since I gave it to him.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiney

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 15month old. She loves it and plays with it in the tub almost every night! Very sturdy and dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 2.5 year old. My husband made them a sandbox, so I thought about buying them some new sand toys. This is very cute. It's hard to buy toys for any child under 4 they loose interest very fast and it seems to waste of money. But this was very cute and she loves it. She still plays with it till this day. Even my 4 year old son plays with the toys. They are very durable as with most Melissa and Doug toys are. A bit pricy for sand toys but they will last and not break in two weeks. GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Lived this product!!! Nice thick plastic. Will last for years if not left outside in the sun! But maybe even then ... time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is as good as it gets! Each piece is colorful, sturdy and just the right size for childrens hands. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Great but lid poorly fits
customer_reviews.text: The materials that come with this set are excellent and durable. They did not make the lid so it fits well, it pops off easily. We ended up throwing it into the beach bag rather than carry it because of the lid issue. Manufacturers should put a latch system on the lid or something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these new tractors. My only complaint is that they are much smaller than I anticipated. They have some larger excavators, etc from John Deere but these are tiny.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This looks just like the picture and is durable. My 2yr old son is into "cooking" and mixing things and he loves this set.
customer_reviews.author: Lakiya

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: I love Melissa and Doug toys,they always so well made. Came in pretty colors. We had fun playing in the sand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed. My granddaughter has been using this for a couple of months in the kitchen for pretend cooking. Just washed it, and it has a large crack. Pretty sure it will no longer hold water. I expected her to have years of fun with this set. I would hesitate to purchase any plastic toys from Melissa and Doug.
customer_reviews.author: kgmom

customer_reviews.title: Love it, top  does stay on
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea especially because my daughter plays “cooking” in the sand all the time. Only downfall is turtle sand softer doesn’t latch onto bucket well and contents spill when traveling to the beach
customer_reviews.author: Siraya Gloudemans

customer_reviews.title: Great for sand
customer_reviews.text: Great set! My 3.5 year old loves it. Made from thick plastic so you can tell it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: GFam16

customer_reviews.title: Bought two for my girls
customer_reviews.text: My children LOVE this sand toy set. I bought two to help eliminate arguing over who is using what and I'm so glad I did because it's the most popular of sand toys that we have. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda GB

customer_reviews.title: Cute sand toys
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the appearance and durability. One fault with mine: lid doesn't stay attached.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: The scoops were fun to use
customer_reviews.text: The scoops were fun to use, as well as the spatula and the whisk. The bucket and lid don't seem to fit together terribly well. Since the bucket doesn't have a swivel handle that can be utilized with one hand, it wasn't used a whole lot by my 4 year old daughter. She definitely showed preference for the bucket that came with the Melissa & Doug Sunny Patch Speck Seahorse Sand Ice Cream Set.
customer_reviews.author: masterhankshake

customer_reviews.title: Fun Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These have been really fun at the park's sand area. The accessories make sharing with others so easy. Children like the sifter. Imagination blossoms.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Z.

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid imaginative toy set
customer_reviews.text: A perfect compliment to the Sunny Patch Sand Cupcake set. This set of baking tools is a lot of fun for the beach or the sandbox. My 3 year-old has a great time sifting dry sand into the mixing bowl, wetting it with the maesuring cups and them using the cupcake set to make cakes. A creative toy that encourages outdoor play. Highly recommended by me.
customer_reviews.author: M. 9 Fingers

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Kids immediately wanted to play with this. It’s cute and everything fits together for easy transporting.
customer_reviews.author: Spukhafte

customer_reviews.title: For the price you can’t really beat that
customer_reviews.text: I love how portable this is. We can’t use it quite yet so I’ll have to update my review when we do. It kind of does look weird but I trust Melissa and Doug toys. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: marianxy25

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Melissa & Doug products are always a great buy. High Quality and too cute!
customer_reviews.author: GAPEACH

customer_reviews.title: We use it in the pool and with dirt and he has the best time 'mixing'
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old LOVES this play set. We use it in the pool and with dirt and he has the best time 'mixing'. A summer full of fun hasn't stained the plastic with mud. I was surprised by how well built and sturdy the pieces are.
customer_reviews.author: bpaul

customer_reviews.title: A must for the pool or beach!
customer_reviews.text: This toy kept my 18 month old entertained for days during our beach vacation! The toys are durable and will last for many seasons. Even my 4 year old joined in on the fun, imagining he was a baker. So glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: S. Matias

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my nephews It’s really cute and a great value those ones from dollar tree don’t hold up and these are really darn cute
customer_reviews.author: Dalya

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Approved
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my toddler at the beach! Everyone loved it! Kept him busy!
customer_reviews.author: swimdiva1502

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This is so adorable!!!! As soon as my son opened the box he made me cut the ties off. He loves it! Really great quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda DiCera

customer_reviews.title: perfect for beach or at home.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a hit with my 1 and a half year old. Not only did it work great at the beach, with every thing you need to play but at home its great to put some water in and let them go crazy. The cups have actual measurements on them too so one day they would be great for a pretend kitchen. The only thing is the faces do rub off but that's with a lot of use. This is my toddler's new favorite toy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Okay. Maybe would make a cute gift.
customer_reviews.text: Just sort of “meh.” I feel like there are better products out there. This set is cute, but that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Likes It
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast. Durable. Colorful. No sharp edges. Perfect for little hands. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: D.H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy for the beach
customer_reviews.text: We took this on a beach vacation. Everyone, including adults, played with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by this mom!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable - just the right size and the little faces make it much more appealing to a child then plain colored plastic. Great idea. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: Rhondalynn Korolak

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 5 years old daughter. She loves all cooking stuff so she really enjoyed the set. The bowl is really big, and is a bit hard for her to carry when full of water, but that doesn't bother her. Minus 1 star for the lid.... it just does not work as a lid, the only thing you can do is try to delicately place it on top of the bowl and hope it stays there. Otherwise it falls down immediately.
customer_reviews.author: ALEXANDRA KEN

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality. Very sturdy plastic- does not break in ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality. Very sturdy plastic- does not break in the sand like the flimsy sand toys.
customer_reviews.author: Momofmany

customer_reviews.title: much smaller than I imagined.
customer_reviews.text: tgecset is great. I was disappointed on the size. I looked like it would be larger
customer_reviews.author: little barbie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality, baby loves them!
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable sand box toys. My 16 month old loves them. Excellent quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Connee

customer_reviews.title: Great Beach Toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at the beginning of summer. My kids love it especially my 2 year old. She sits for hours “making pies” and mixing water in the bucket with her wisk.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my one year old son's photo shoot thinking it would be a cute prop option at the beach. We didn't end up using the set for the shoot, but my son plays with the set all the time. He loves putting things inside the measuring spoons and whisking toys/sand/grass around. The quality is great. I would definitely recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: mhillgoth

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with the kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect beach toy. It is adorable and the kids loved playing with it. Definitely better quality than a lot of other beach toys.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Torra

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this! quick shipping. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett V.

customer_reviews.title: Not for building a sand castle.
customer_reviews.text: It truly did not help a child with making a sand castle. It was more about cooking. It didn’t have the proper shapes to build a sand castle.
customer_reviews.author: K. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to a sandbox or bath.
customer_reviews.text: My kids used this in their sandbox but would also work in the bath.
customer_reviews.author: Caoimhe de búrca

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and creative
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and creative. Used at the beach, and had to buy a sand box at home so she could keep "baking". Would definately recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mp

customer_reviews.title: Best sand toy ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best sand toy ever! My son niece and nephew were all fighting over this at the beach so we had to buy two more for next year!
customer_reviews.author: Kaci

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: These are not only adorable but great quality. So nice to see something different than the typical beach toys.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, the octopus whisk is my son's favorite. I bought another set for my parents beach house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great purchase for my daughter. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: No handle or lid!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the babies on the beach. However, the lid doesn’t really attach and there isn’t a handle. So, if you’re taking your little one to the beach, don’t expect them to carry the bucket!
customer_reviews.author: CateCate

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: Cutest set for sand box or beach. My 4yo pretends to bake!
customer_reviews.author: nancy w

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this set
customer_reviews.text: My kids fight over the one spoon so you may want to purchase more than one set for more than one kid.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Best gift ever! My 7,5, and 1 year old all want to play with this... inside the house, at the beach, at the pool, and even at the park (they mixed leaves and dirt and water and other found treasures together)!
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Mama of 4

customer_reviews.title: Great toy with learning potential!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves this sand/creek toy! He is even using the measurements listed on the bowl and cups to discuss his recipes ;)
customer_reviews.author: Dianabrach

customer_reviews.title: A hit!
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3 year old LOVES this toy! I bought it for the sandbox, but it hasn’t even made it out there yet, because he hasn’t put it down in the house once.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Missing the red spoon for this. So retuning will buy again next year and try it out again. Maybe next time I’ll get the full product.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Jans

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: It is a gift for my grandbaby! She'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Adian

customer_reviews.title: just adorable! Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn't say it's from Melissa and Doug, but definitely the cutest sand/water toy ever! Has the cup size on the scoops, just adorable! Well worth it! Good quality! not the plastic you buy from Walmart!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Beach!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son loved this little baking set!! He used it the entire time we were at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Chasity H.

customer_reviews.title: One of my sons favorites!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this for the beach and his water table!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pool/beach toy!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 year old son for the pool and/or beach and he loves it! It arrived in excellent condition and was exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: The lid doesn't stay on very well but she still enjoyed playing with them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter to play with at the beach. The lid doesn't stay on very well but she still enjoyed playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Great gift, but might of worked a little bit better carrying to the beach with a handle. Overall a great gift for the beach
customer_reviews.author: DIANE D.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Beach Day
customer_reviews.text: My 9 mo old son didn’t really care for any of these toys except the whisk. Adults got a kick out of it tho.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Seaside Sidekicks Sand Baking Set
product_meta.description:
Make fabulous mudpies and sandcakes with this sea-creature inspired "baking" set. Young chefs will love using the shell-shaped measuring cups, octopus whisk and crab mixing spoon to "cook" up some great beach treats. The turtle lid on the mixing bowl doubles as a sifter!

Mixing, sifting and baking theme presents an exciting twist on sand toys! This set makes an exceptional gift for kids from 3 to 5. Add the Melissa & Doug Blossom Bright Kids' Sprinkler to round out the hands-on play experience and give kids another engaging option for screen-free fun.

For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.” We design every toy to the highest quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we'll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!
feature_bullets: TIME TO BAKE!: Make fabulous mudpies and sandcakes with this sea creature inspired "baking" set
SEASIDE CREATIVITY: This 7 piece set includes 3 shell shaped measuring cups, octopus whisk, crab mixing spoon, and a mixing bowl. The turtle lid on the mixing bowl doubles as a sifter
PLAY AND LEARN: Our Melissa & Doug Sunny Patch Seaside Sidekicks Sand Baking Set encourages exploration and outdoor play. Mixing, sifting and baking theme presents an exciting twist on sand toys
GREAT GIFT FOR AGES 3 TO 5: This set makes an exceptional gift for kids from 3 to 5. Add the Melissa & Doug Blossom Bright Kids' Sprinkler to round out the hands on, screen free play experience

100 Percent HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: We design every toy to the highest quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we'll make it right. Our phone number is on every product

“THE GOLD STANDARD IN CHILDHOOD PLAY”: For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination and creativity sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play”
